name: Box Maze Extreme
description:
Think you got what it takes?
Challenge Yourself with 30 Extreme levels!

Get ready for the challenge as you play through 30 Extreme levels while avoiding dangerous hazards like poison pits, blades, spikes and many enemies.
Your goal is to progress through each puzzle like level with as few deaths as possible, reaching different ranks from Cardboard, Silver, Gold, Platinum and Boxpert upon completing the game.
Unlock achievements as you play through each hazard and enemy to reach the warp and advance to the next level while testing your reflexes and your ability to quickly find the best possible routes.
Box Maze Extreme is intended to be Extreme difficulty while also being a fun game that is set to push the limits of your memory, reflexes and more.

Warning: Box Maze Extreme is not for the faint-hearted.


Box Maze Extreme will include many challenging achievements.


Special achievements based on the rank you finish Box Maze Extreme on.
Ranks include Cardboard, Silver, Gold, Platinum and Boxpert and are based on the amount of times you die in the game, dying less will reward you with a higher rank.


FREE Skins for all!


From Poison, blades and spikes to exploding barrels and more !


1. Challenging game play.
2. Score board.
3. Death counter.
4. Hazards.
5. FREE Character skins.
6. More enemies and obstructions.
7. Checkpoints instead of saves.
8. Includes FREE skins!
9. Steam marketplace. (Not yet available)
10. Steam trading cards. (Not yet available)
And much more.

Information on Trading Cards
Trading card's will be in Box Maze Extreme as soon as we reach the "confidence metric " that Steam recently added.
For more information on the confidence metric please click here
